items.name: Creative Force
items.description: Creative Force offers a content production platform that streamlines the workflow for creating digital assets.

items.name: AWS
items.description: AWS provides a comprehensive suite of cloud services that support scalable and flexible IT infrastructure.

items.name: Google Cloud
items.description: Google Cloud offers cloud computing services that enable businesses to build, deploy, and scale applications efficiently.

items.name: Edgio
items.description: Edgio provides a content delivery network (CDN) that enhances website performance and security.

items.name: Fastly
items.description: Fastly offers an edge cloud platform that accelerates content delivery and improves site performance.

items.name: MongoDB
items.description: MongoDB provides a NoSQL database solution that supports flexible and scalable data management.

items.name: Netlify
items.description: Netlify offers a platform-as-a-service (PaaS) that enables developers to deploy and manage modern web projects efficiently.

items.name: Vercel
items.description: Vercel provides a platform for frontend developers to deploy and scale web applications with ease.

items.name: Vultr
items.description: Vultr offers cloud compute and storage solutions that support scalable and cost-effective application deployment.

items.name: XTM
items.description: XTM provides a translation management system that helps businesses manage multilingual content efficiently.
